html:
4.29.17  5:37 am   how do i make art that satisfies me? or more accurately: how do i learn to love my own art?

     i'm not sure. if you don't like what you're doing then perhaps you should do something you like more

4.29.17  5:24 am   do you enjoy being questioned about trivial subjects on a daily basis

     it is a valuable learning experience

4.29.17  4:57 am   Is your creativity holding you hostage?

     ah, yes for sure

4.29.17  4:02 am   Do you have a good idea of how diverse your audience is?

     no

4.29.17  2:19 am   Last time you updated your hotewig question page, you said you were on jingle 28. Are you on 29 now?

     jingles are done except for some small fixes which got added to the list of all the other small fixes to be made

4.29.17  12:26 am   do you try to accept the things you can't change, or change the things you can't accept?

     yes. maybe even switch which is which

4.29.17  12:14 am   where is your favorite place in the entire universe

     the universe i'm in is always changing. so the places are always different

4.28.17  11:29 pm   I see you have new stuff in the works, but haven't made a video since mid-last year.

     that's not true, i've been working on a video the entire time

     Is your resurgence due to the gaining popularity of your History of Japan video?

     i never left. and most of the popularity of history of japan actually occured before the point when you think i left. i hope that makes sense

      But what's really important is this, what is your next project called and what's it about?

     i can't tell you
4.28.17  11:09 pm   what is hotewig please i have no idea but everyone is using it like an inside joke im being left out on

4.28.17  11:04 pm   Do you have any specific goals for the future?

     yes

4.28.17  10:50 pm   what will te next video b

     i can't tell you

4.28.17  10:38 pm   Is there parking at my local theater?

     i don't know

4.28.17  10:00 pm   Are you more likely to answer a question if it does not start with a capital letter?

     no

4.28.17  10:00 pm   What is on your mind, Bill?

     at this point, just trying to remain calm and move forward step by step

4.28.17  9:52 pm   would you accept donations?

     oh hell yeah

4.28.17  9:00 pm   would you live on north sentinel island?

     seems like something you have to be born into

4.28.17  8:55 pm   what are you opinions on onions

     they are ok

4.28.17  6:11 pm   where is your point of view located?

     here

4.28.17  6:08 pm   Will humans ever stop making garbage?

     yes

     Or do we enjoy it too much now?

     i don't think anyone enjoys it. it is a side effect of a lot of our newest technology, which is still extremely new. soon we will have a better understanding of how get things done

4.28.17  5:53 pm   do you have an opinion on Tenerife? if so, what is it? If not, can you acquire one?

     not right now

4.28.17  5:53 pm   Are you a seagull?

     i don't think so

4.28.17  5:39 pm   Do you know about the country Malta? If yes, is in the HOTEWIG video?

     i forget

4.28.17  5:35 pm   would the human race be better off without nukes and various other Big weapons

     contemplating the concept is inevitable on our quest to learn, do, know, and be everything

4.28.17  5:05 pm   to be or not to be?

     surely you will get a chance to do both

4.28.17  4:37 pm   is hotewig being finished by the end of april still mostly plausible

     almost

4.28.17  4:29 pm   What's your opinion on armadillos?

     i think they exist but i'm not totally sure

4.28.17  4:22 pm   Is it the history of Britain, then the British Empire? Maybe the various countries that lead to Britain how it is?

     not exactly

4.28.17  4:03 pm   What does the ]]]] in a brief history of spain (and portugal) mean?

     i think it makes much more sense if you see the 3 videos that came before it

4.28.17  3:37 pm   how to play crazy bass riffs?

     understand the song

4.28.17  3:34 pm   Do you believe in original thoughts?

     yes

4.28.17  3:13 pm   what is left on the to-do list for hotewig?

     a long list of very small things

     also, are there any references to hoj in hotewig?

     there is one very small and subtle reference

4.28.17  2:10 pm   UPLOAD SOMETHING ALREADY I LOVE U BYE

     i have to finish making the thing i am going to upload
4.28.17  2:05 pm   when will you post HOTEWIG

4.28.17  1:43 pm   Have you ever read a question that made you roll your eyes

     i typically roll my eyes from left to right, following the words of the question from the beginning to the end and perhaps jumping down a line if it is a multiple line question

4.28.17  1:25 pm   I'm just typing

     nice

4.28.17  12:51 pm   any tips on how to be more organized? I want to arrange a schedule in which I can do everything that I want to do in the most efficient way. the thing is, whenever I try something like this, I never actually see the schedule so I don't really keep up with it

     have you tried posting the schedule on the wall or something, so you can see it
4.28.17  12:30 pm   Will you answer this question with "no"?

4.28.17  12:18 pm   What songs on Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band album are of interest to you?

     the one where u were getting a parking ticket but the parking meter lady was so fine you had to ask her out to tea

4.28.17  12:13 pm   Is it ok to bombard you with supportive emails?

     sure

4.28.17  12:13 pm   what are some major differences between crocodiles and alligators?

     i don't know any of the differences

     what do they like to do?

     eat stuff i guess, i'm not too sure

4.28.17  12:13 pm   is Spain a country you would be interested in making a "history of" video on?

     sure. but right now there are other things that i am more interested in

4.28.17  12:11 pm   Do you think written language has limitations?

     sure

4.28.17  11:22 am   whatcha tryin to do here

     whatever i can

4.28.17  11:01 am   What fun fact do you have for us?

     there's life on this planet

4.28.17  10:54 am   do you know what initially pushed you to start working on this video instead of working on songs?

     yes. i was trying to do a mixed content schedule, with assorted short/medium videos, leading up to some 2min and 3min songs. but people got really really angry about the short videos, especially the 5-6 second ones. i realized i really don't even need to do those anymore. the only reason i was doing it was to keep the fans 'happy' and keep uploads happening. when i saw the rage i figured what's the point. there was also anger about 'not doing another history video' which i really don't care about, because i gotta do what i'm gonna do. but then i saw people come to my defense and say 'he only wanted to do 1 history video' that was when i realized something was wrong. the japan one was just for practice. it was not supposed to be the only one. so that's when i knew it was time to go all the way and get it over with, before moving on to the next major egg to crack, which is a regularly scheduled stream of medium / full length song releases forever

4.28.17  10:39 am   do u like the sound of leaves rustling on a windy day?

     it's ok

4.28.17  10:32 am   Are you actually making a new video?

     yes

      I feel like you may just be trolling everyone at this point.

     that seems counter productive

4.28.17  10:27 am   how does it feel to be telling the story of the whole world?

     insane

4.28.17  10:03 am   why are your answers so glib

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

4.28.17  9:15 am   What are the chances of the video being done in the next week?

     your guess is as good as mine. i am working as fast as i can
